CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Unit_of_Weight__c), "GR", IF(Gross_Weight__c >= 10, Gross_Weight__c / 1000, Gross_Weight__c), "LB", IF(Gross_Weight__c >= 0.1, Gross_Weight__c / 2.205, Gross_Weight__c), "MG", IF(Gross_Weight__c >= 10000, Gross_Weight__c / 1000000, Gross_Weight__c), Gross_Weight__c )
CustomField.label: Gross Weight (kg)
